column3: His own heart laughed: and that was quite enough for him.

column2: He had no further intercourse with Spirits, but lived upon the Total Abstinence Principle, ever afterwards; and it was always said of him, that he knew how to keep Christmas well, if any man alive possessed the knowledge.
column3: He had no further intercourse with Spirits, but lived upon the Total Abstinence Principle, ever afterwards; and it was always said of him, that he knew how to keep Christmas well, if any man alive possessed the knowledge.

column2: May that be truly said of us, and all of us!
column3: May that be truly said of us, and all of us!

column2: And so, as Tiny Tim observed, God bless Us, Every One!
column3: And so, as Tiny Tim observed, God bless Us, Every One!
